author: Anna Almendrala | California Healthline, Susan Rinkunas
title: Almost a Third of Young People Have Lost Their Jobs So Far
description: As measures to slow the coronavirus pandemic lead to mass layoffs, people ages 18 to 34 are being disproportionately affected.
content:
Emilio Romero, 23, has mixed feelings about losing his job. Its a major financial setback, but with two previous hospitalizations for pneumonia, a restaurant was not the safest place for the recent college graduate as the COVID-19 pandemic mushroomed.
